snippet: If having overly loud phone conversations in public places isn't getting you enough attention, you might consider the OMG iPhone case from Sillybrandz. It has LEDs that illuminate the case when the phone is used.
abstract: If having overly loud phone conversations in public places isn't getting you enough attention, you might consider the OMG iPhone case from Sillybrandz. It has LEDs that illuminate the case when the phone is used.

headline.main: LED Cases Call Attention to Your Calls
headline.print_headline: An iPhone Case That Also Delivers a Light Show
